title: Stop Feeding the Flesh
verse_text: So I say, walk by the Spirit, and you will not gratify the desires of the flesh.
insight: What you feed grows. Galatians 5:16 tells us that walking by the Spirit means starving the flesh.
Your spirit is only as strong as your diet. Junk in, junk out. Spirit in, Spirit out.
one_minute_win: Skip one indulgence today (snack, screen, gossip) and use that time to pray.
declaration: I feed my spirit, not my flesh.
related_devotionals: Romans 13:14 Devotional - Clothe Yourself with Christ
Colossians 3:5 Devotional - Put to Death Earthly Desires
